Welcome to Obraz!

2014-01-01

You'll find this post in your _posts directory â€” edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Obraz also offers powerful support for code snippets via highlight.js:

def print_hi(name):
    print('Hi, {}'.format(name))

# Prints 'Hi, Andrey' to sys.stdout
print_hi('Andrey')

Check out the Obraz docs for more info on how to get the most out of Obraz. File all bugs/feature requests at Obraz's Bitbucket repo.
